content:
We should soon start having regular calls for maintaining IG templates - implementing features, resolving issues...
If you're interested in joning, please register your timezone preference. Then the calls will be scheduled accordingly. https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/196008-ig-publishing.20requirements/topic/Updating.20IG.20Templates.20-.20calls
New poll on the same link above, this time to select a specific time now that we've filtered timezones. Please indicate which ones you can attend with semi-regularity.
